!- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
! 
! Name / Code (matrix format, use .* ./ and .^)
! EDIT WITH CAUTION (No empty line without the comment symbol (!)
!
! DON’T PUT any mathematical symbols ’+’, ‘-‘, ‘/‘, ‘*’ in the variable name !!!
! use sum_XY, ratio_XY, mult_XY, etc
!
! 
XMg		Mg./(Mg+Fe)
XMg_M1		Mg_M1./(Mg_M1+Fe_M1)
XFe		Fe./(Mg+Fe)
XFe_M1		Fe_M1./(Mg_M1+Fe_M1)
XFe3		Fe3./(Fe2+Fe3)
!
Al_tot		Aliv+Alvi
sum_AlSi	Al+Si
!
ratio_YbGd	172Yb./157Gd
!
NewVariName	NewComputation
